column5: Well this is something very cool I was talking to George Unis he let me know the board has changed so I gave it a try and my 3+ year Jail sentence is over. I have no clue what happened but TJ and Roy tried a few times to get me onto the message board but my system was still blocked. I'm glad to be back time to catch up on whats been going on here. I see I have many messages to get through sorry to all the ones who I have not replied to.  Cheers Mike
wow 3 years!??!!!
yeah, but look at all the time it gave you to make baits lol welcome back
Welcome back Mike good to see you again.  Art
3 years??? Yikes! What did you do? Cheer for the Sens? lol
And you are whom? LOL  Good to hear from ya bud.

Man you wouldn't get 3 years in Ontario of you robbed a gas station. Glad to see you back Mike. Do you still have the StarCraft that is basically the twin to mine? Mine  is a Superfisherman 190. If I can remember 3 years ago you have or had a 170. How's my memory?
lol see mike I can find a nut once in a while like a blind squirrel.
Maybe Andy will pop up next...
that jail cell was wielded shut  lol
or GCD or Billy Bob

I get the jail cell lock all the time..  Its the IP's address range I just keep disconnecting and reconnecting PPoE connecting until I get off the block list.. Also if you use a VPN blocker that also puts you on the naughty list
HUH, 3 years..........and no one missed you..........LOL........JK..........welcome back.

LOL thanks for the warm welcome guys I feel like its only been a week.  Oh and the three years was a guess it might have been longer I cant count that high Im lost past 10 days as I can not see my toes Lex I have no clue about the computer talk your using I just turn the ting on and it either goes or not I call my 13 year old service Tek to handle any computer problems. When Ron was here he could not get on when connected to WIFI it happened last board change all I know it its working now and life is good. Just sold the Starcraft last year bumped up to a 2016 Stratos love the boat its a wicked ,machine for the big water. You do have a good memory
Wasn't it you that had a 18 Starcraft Mariner before the Superfisherman ?

Yes I did it was a amazing boat I was actually going to just put a new 4 stoke motor on her but my wife talked me into a new boat. I loved that boat we had many memories made on  it with the family and it came from Don and Ruth off the board here so it already had many great memories built into it.
So what yer saying is, yer a bass guy now ?  LOL  Nice  ride.

LOL nope it can hide out as a Bass boat but she is a multi species boat or Ski and Fish which ever name they use. Nice deep hull she cuts the waves great handles the big waves with ease and is built with out any wood very sturdy boat that should last my lifetime.
Now that is a sweet ride. A 9.9 kicker and some riggers, and I am ready to guide you for some Simcoe lakers.

LOL I am staying away from a kicker I dont want to make the full move to troller I will wait until my body will not let me cast then think about it. I am actually very happy with the way this 4 stroke trolls its quiet and does not use much fuel.
